definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Come on! Are you a man or an amoeba?
sentences.chinese: 安德森先生，快點你是個人或阿米巴變形蟲？
雖然人體不像阿米巴原蟲一樣分裂。
比如阿米巴原蟲會分裂，對吧？

sentences.english: Therefore, amebic dysentery was the predominant cause during this outbreak.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴痢疾爲法定乙類傳染病。

sentences.english: The rabbit model of Acanthamoeba keratitis was successfully established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了家兔棘阿米巴角膜炎動物模型。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo investigate the immune defense ability of patients with amoebic liver abscess.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解阿米巴肝膿腫患者機體的免疫防衛能力。

sentences.english: Entamoeba histolytica is, possibly, the most pathogenic amoeba for humans.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴原蟲大概是對人最容易引起疾病的變形蟲。

sentences.english: Objective To look for a better methods for culture and preservation of Entamoeba invades.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索侵襲內阿米巴較好的培養和保種方法。

sentences.english: You've got an amoeba split,going along.
Amebic dysentery is B type infectious disease legally.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴痢疾爲法定乙類傳染病。

sentences.english: Amoebae consist of just one more or less homogeneous cell.
sentences.chinese: 阿米巴只含有一種大體同質的細胞。

sentences.english: Iodoquinol and chloroquine are often used to treat amoebic dysentery.
sentences.chinese: 雙碘喹啉和氯喹常用於治療阿米巴痢疾。

sentences.english: The ability of amoebocytes from snails of both localities to phagocytose sheep red blood cells was confirmed in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 兩地螺的阿米巴細胞均具有體外吞噬羊紅細胞的能力。

sentences.english: Conclusion There is ACP in the spreading blood cells of oncomelania hupensis.
sentences.chinese: 結論釘螺血淋巴細胞中的伸展性阿米巴細胞含ACP。

sentences.english: There was fragment of E. coli that was not digested in some of the amoebae.
sentences.chinese: 部分阿米巴蟲體內殘存未消化的細菌碎片。

pinyin: guan1 jian4 ji4 xiao4 zhi3 biao1

definition: methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
